phrases: Your host, once again, is me, your neighbor, Kai Harada.
Look at those smooth spokes shining as they spin!
Last week's topic was, The King of Terror is supposed to come from the sky this July.
This mountain bike was a gift to celebrate me getting into high school.
What are the citizens of Morioh City going to do?
Getting new stuff is always exciting.
All right, let us get to the replies.
This one's from RIP Big Bro.
I am not going to be able to take the bus to school for a while!
I wonder what happened to his big bro?
There is a bag in the middle of the road.
The thing in that bag was...
Wh-What am I going to do?!
It was in the middle of the road!
There was nothing I could have done!
You are not the one at fault here.
That was just an unfortunate accident.
The guy who put the kitten in a bag and left it in the road is at fault.
Talk about a terrible thing to do.
W-We have to treat its injuries!
You do not hear it crying, do you?
My name's Tamami Kobayashi, and I graduated from
Just shut up and sit down.
So... I have got an idea.
I will bury that cat for you,
so give me a little money.
It is true that this was not your fault,
but are you planning to do nothing about killing my cat?
Did you say it was your cat?
Y-You put the kitten o-over there?
That is not the problem anymore.
I am asking you if you are really going to do nothing about it and go.
You are the one that killed it, bro.
Hey, you are feeling guilty, right?
If your heart could be freed
from the shackles of guilt by paying some cash...
Would not it be better to just pay up?
Then this should go even faster, Hirose.
Is not that Koichi standing over there?
That kid hangs out with shady-looking characters all the time.
But he looks like he is having fun.
I met a guy named Keicho Nijimura about four months ago,
I had no idea what was going on, but man, I was happy.
I figured that if I could use this ability properly,
it could support me for the rest of my life.
These shackles will not come off if you do not pay up.
You looked away just now, did not you?
It is not nice to lie, you know.
You felt bad about lying, did not you?
The more guilt you feel, the bigger the lock becomes.
These shackles are the weight of your sins.
Even if I am sleeping, or if you try to run far away, it is never coming off.
If you get it, then show me your wallet.
You should have just given me this in the first place.
Th-That is for buying sneakers for gym class today.
What are you doing over there?
A grown man trying to threaten a high school kid for money?
Try getting a job to earn your money.
You little boys stay out of this!
Not when there is some smelly trash around, using some petty Stand.
We have got to take out that trash properly.
This seriously is not coming off.
You guys can see it, too?
Just how many of you can see that?
That is what I want to know.
But right now, that does not matter.
Would you kindly take that lock off of him?
I am not playing games here!
Sinners must pay for their sins.
That is the rule of society.
You are going to pay me instead of Koichi?
Then I will let you off the hook.
You are going to try to get money from me?
You just took 7,000 yen for me!
That was the fee for lying to me!
You are trying to pay for that poor kitten's life with just 7,000 yen?
I will take about five hundred grand for that.
We told you to give his 7,000 yen back, so give it back, you dipshit!
Wh-Why the hell did you wobble around and fall over on your own?
How dare you say that after hitting me?!
Do not feel any guilt toward him!
Front teeth are pretty expensive, you know...
Since I do not have insurance.
Do not try anything funny with me.
If anyone who is got my lock on them tries to damage me in any way,
it goes right back to that lock.
Is the kitten that you said Koichi ran over
I picked up your front tooth for you.
My heart feels so much lighter now!
Hey, are not you forgetting the 7,000 yen?
Once the money's down, hurry up and get out of here, dumbass!
He took the big parts that the bank would exchange!
Even if it is not my money.
I was only able to get 7,000 yen.
Do not think you are going to get away with that.
My day started off with something terrible, so I was down the whole day.
I have heard all about you around town, madam.
They say you are beautiful, kind, and so refined.
Wh-Why is he in my house rubbing my mom's shoulders?!
I-I asked you wh-what you were doing here!
This gentleman delivered the money you dropped.
You must have been in a hurry.
You told her you found it?
You ran into Mr. Kobayashi on your bike today, did not you?
I made sure you got your money back, Koichi.
Ko, why are you so worked up?
Madam, this is hard for me to say,
but it appears that I dropped my wallet when we ran into each other, too.
It looks just like this one.
Which means our wallets got swapped.
Do you understand what I am saying, madam?
Y-Yes, though that seems very unusual.
But I guess it is possible.
So I would like you to tell Koichi to return my wallet to me.
It had about five hundred thousand yen in it.
Please tell him to give it back to me.
I can prove that our wallets got switched.
Last night, I had a hamburger combo at Jonny's.
I added an order of onion gratin soup...
So I believe the total on the receipt was 1,833 yen.
It should be tucked away in the wallet Koichi has.
You did this earlier, did not you?!
And then you went out of your way to buy a similar wallet!
I hate to say this, but your son, though I am sure it is just a phase, is pretty rotten.
Do not you feel guilty as his mother
for raising a son like that?
Now the weight of her guilt will not allow her heart to be free.
I am going to take you for everything you have got.
First, I will take this house's land, title, and seal.
What a great house this is.
Earlier, when she brought me tea, I made her spill some on my hand,
and then acted like it really burned.
She was so cute and sexy.
So she is a third-year at a girls' school?
You will not get away with this!
What is up with that puny egg thing?
Mom, Sis, please leave the room for a while.
Please, do not ask any questions now.
K-Keep that thing away from me!
Your mom and sister leaving the room
does not change the fact that th-they are my hostages!
I will not let you harm my mom or sister.
Take the locks off of them!
If your mom sees you beating the crap out of me,
her guilt is just going to grow more and more!
I told you to take them off!
Do not underestimate Tamami Kobayashi, you pissy little shit!
L-Like hell I will take them off!
The sound is impressive, but it is actually super weak!
What the hell is with your Stand?
It does not have any speed or power at all!
How dare you scare me like that, you dumbass?!
I will show you that a Stand's strength comes from how strong you are mentally!
Which means your mental strength is zero!
I am going to make sure you pay dearly for this!
S-Something strange is going on with his cheek!
It looks like a manga sound effect.
I hear a weird ringing in my ears!
Like the sound I heard when I got hit...
What the hell is this writing on my arm?!
W-Wait... Th-These sounds that I hear coming from inside me...
My Stand makes the sound resonate from inside his body.
C-Come to think of it, there was that famous Basho Matsuo poem I learned at school...
The shrill of the cicadas Seeps into the rocks
If you take the locks off my mom and sister, I will stop the sound.
even I do not know what will happen to your body.
Stop being stubborn and take off those locks!
How dare you do this to me?!
Like I could threaten and con if I was afraid of a little brat like you!
The Tama in my name means ballsy!
I will show you just how ballsy I am!
I am not scared of some knife!
I will show you how terrifying I can be!
The true fear of the locks!
Ow, ow, ow, ow, ow, ow, ow, ow!
Make the cut shallow, and scream like hell!
I-It is not what it looks like!
How could you do something so terrifying?!
t's not what it looks like!
Hurry up and stop this sound, Koichi!
If you do not stop this sound,
your mom will not be able to bear the weight of her guilt.
When humans cannot bear the weight of their sins anymore,
they think they would be better off dead.
Are you going to let your mom kill herself?!
No, I will not stop the sound.
I will do the opposite, and make more sound!
This is a matter of the soul!
Like hell she will believe you!
If I, his own mother, will not believe in him,
Koichi's always been a nice boy.
He would never hurt anyone or take their money.
My parents would never believe in me!
Ko, it was all just a joke!
Take the lock off my sister, too.
We cannot do anything to harm her beauty, right?
I was only kidding about taking your house!
I even gave back your 7,000 yen, did not I?
I will do anything, Master Koichi!
Make sure you bring me five hundred grand by tomorrow.
It is only a little joke.
Th-That did not sound like a joke!
What the hell is going on here?
Allow me to carry your bag to school!
You are seriously going to carry it?
You are a true man among men!
